snippet.description: Fungus. Soak your feet, up to your ankles, in a bucket of half water & half white vinegar every night. If your shoes are washable,soak them in the solution for a few hours,then wash regular. If they're not washable & they stink,get rid of them. Don't More »

snippet.description: Athlete's foot can cause itchy feet. Athlete's foot is a fungal infection that develops in the moist areas between your toes and sometimes on other parts of your foot. More »
